entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as standing up and murmuring to Ron, Hermione, and Ginny. He follows Professor McGonagall back down the ward.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who he says goodbye to.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who he says goodbye to.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who he says goodbye to.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as leading Harry back down the ward and towards Dumbledore's office.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being deceased, with his body possibly lying in his office.

relationships.description: Harry follows Professor McGonagall back down the ward and towards Dumbledore's office.
Harry had visited Dumbledore in his office mere hours previously.
